fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Produce sun at night.
- Use a Peashooter to deal a Basic attack to someone. Costs 2 sun.
- Plant a Sunflower to increase your sun production by 1. Costs 2 sun.
- Plant a Cherry Bomb to deal an Unstoppable attack to 3 people who neighbor each other on the player list. Costs 4 sun.
- Plant a Wall Nut to block all attacks to another player, which lasts until this is triggered. Costs 3 sun.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You start with 2 sun.
- Your sun production starts at 1.
